sentence: No more crazy people.” Kayleigh McEnany responded: “Yes 100%.” A few days later, on January 10, 2021, Mr. Hannity wrote to the White House Chief of Staff and Congressman Jim Jordan with the following message: “Guys, we have a clear path to land the plane in 9 days.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Hannity Texted White House a Five-Point Plan for How to Deal With Trump on Jan. 7: ‘No More Stolen Election Talk’

sentence: Ever,” Mr. Hannity wrote on Jan. 10, 2021, to Mr. Meadows and Representative Jim Jordan, an Ohio Republican.
title: After Jan. 6, Sean Hannity Advised Trump: ‘No More Stolen Election Talk’

sentence: I will help reinforce.” Also, Hannity said he believed it was “key” to keep Trump away from certain people, texting: “No more crazy people,” leading McEnany to respond: “Yes, 100%.” Hannity also wrote in a text to Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) and then-White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows: Guys, we have a clear path to land the plane in 9 days.
author: JD Heyes
title: More leaked texts from the Jan. 6 Committee show messaging coordination between Hannity, McEnany

sentence: The committee has also sought testimony from Republican members of Congress, including House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy and Ohio GOP Rep. Jim Jordan, but so far it has yet to issue subpoenas to compel testimony from the lawmakers.
author: Gloria Borger
title: Exclusive: Trump WH spokesman is sent subpoena by January 6 committee

sentence: So far, three lawmakers have been asked to help with the investigation: Reps. Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.), Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) and Scott Perry (R-Pa.).
author: Callie Patteson
title: Ex-Trump press secretary Kayleigh McEnany hands over texts to Jan. 6 panel
